Articles.Content: Does anyone have issues where mechjeb just stops working?  I have issues where it either doesnt perform the indicated action correctly or it wont do it at all and other times it will. Ive completely reinstalled my game and I reboot my PC every so often. Im running the latest version of KSP and MJ2.  Please help.  Thanks

Wierd. Please ask on the mechjeb thread. 

Did you install module manager? Did you run out of connection or battery or kerbals?

21 hours ago, Pork Belly Gamer said:

Does anyone have issues where mechjeb just stops working?  I have issues where it either doesnt perform the indicated action correctly or it wont do it at all and other times it will. Ive completely reinstalled my game and I reboot my PC every so often. Im running the latest version of KSP and MJ2.  Please help.  Thanks

Best thing you can do is ask in the MJ thread.   But as @sarbian says, No Logs, No Support.   So before you ask, you'll want to read the OP in the MJ thread to figure out what you need to have when you ask.    Screenshots and more details will help too, as your description is kind of vague.
